content: this crochet beach skirt is the perfect blend of playful and practical designed for sunny days sandy toes and effortless style made with an open mesh design it offers great breathability while still giving that extra layer of coverage over swimsuits the ombre color fade from soft cream to a bold coral pink adds a stunning visual effect that feels as vibrant as summer itself yarn - any dk weight yarns in colors of your choice the prototype used 2 strands of #2 to get dk equivalent estimated total yardage ankle/floor length 800 900 1000 1100 1200 1300 1400 1500 1600 yards knee length = 400 500 600 700 800 900 1000 1100 1200 yards hook and other materials 5 mm crochet hook elastic band = ⅛ to ½ thickness by 40 44 48 52 64 72 80 84 92 terms - us terminology difficulty level - intermediate finished measurement size s and color code xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl hip measurement 32 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 64 skirt length 40 42 44 44 46 46 48 48 50 model skirt shown in medium i would like to see your version of this skirt kindly tag me with your makes using #serenacrochetbeachskirt @crochet_fosbas on ig and fosbas on facebook i am happy to answer questions about this pattern kindly contact me at fosbascroceht@gmail com or you can join our community on the facebook group here - https //www facebook com/groups/496008034687310
